All,
Great stuff. However, I ran into multiple issues and also need enhancements which I don't have much time to fix/implement at this time. If someone is interested I am accepting bids for these to be addressed very soon and undoubtedly included in the public project.
Here are some items:

1. Ugly native title bar buttons show when pressing on custom buttons
2. The form can't be automatically resized below certain width, i.e, a call to this.Width = 20; will set the width to something over 100 even though you can decrease the size with the mouse.

3. There's a problem displaying icons when a vertical bar remains on mouse up. Will provide details.

5. Implement docking to the desktop

6. The window crashes when resized to 0 width.

7. Minor: Rich forms don't refresh properly on resize, get holes in the background, however slapping a bacckground panel helps.

Ok, please contact me to cdemez2@hotmail.com and we will discuss about this.

Thanks
